entry.string: Overview
entry.translation: Oferfeeoo

entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: The Blogger API is a XML-RPC API used for blogging. The API is very simple and is basically a way to exchange strings between xmlrpc clients and servers.
entry.translation: Zee Blugger EPI is a XML-RPC EPI used fur bluggeeng. Zee EPI is fery seemple-a und is beseecelly a vey tu ixchunge-a streengs betveee xmlrpc cleeents und serfers.

entry.string: In Xaraya the xmlrpcserver module is responsible for providing the xmlrpc transport needed for the Blogger API functionality. This module will not function without that module activated.
entry.translation: In Xereya zee xmlrpcserfer mudoole-a is respunseeble-a fur prufeeding zee xmlrpc trunspurt needed fur zee Blugger EPI fooncshuneleety.Thees mudoole-a veell nut fooncshun veethuoot thet mudoole-a ecteefeted.

entry.string: In addition to that, the xmlrpcserver module needs one or more API modules activated to actually do anything. The bloggerAPI is one such module. It is advised that the xmlrpcsystemAPI module is also activated.
entry.translation: In eddeeshun tu thet, zee xmlrpcserfer mudoole-a needs oone-a oor mure-a EPI mudooles ecteefeted tu ectooelly du unytheeng. Zee bluggerEPI is oone-a sooch mudoole-a. It is edfeesed thet zee xmlrpcsystemEPI mudoole-a is elsu ecteefeted.

entry.string: You can find the specification of the Blogger API at
entry.translation: Yuoo cun feend zee speceefficeshun ooff zee Blugger EPI et

entry.string: Little survival guide for using Blogging tools with Xaraya
entry.translation: Leettle-a soorfeefel gooeede-a fur useeng Bluggeeng tuuls veet Xereya

entry.string: Make sure you have enabled the following modules
entry.translation: Meke-a soore-a yuoo hefe-a inebled zee fullooeeng mudooles

entry.string: XmlRpcServer
entry.translation: XmlRpcSerfer

entry.string: Categories
entry.translation: Cetegureees

entry.string: Articles
entry.translation: Erteecles

entry.string: When these modules are activated, configure the categories modules and create some categories which should hold the postings made from Blogs. While not necessary, it is advised to create a publication type for blog postings specifically and link this type to the category-tree you created for blog postings.
entry.translation: Vhee zeese-a mudooles ere-a ecteefeted, cunffeegoore-a zee cetegureees mudooles und creete-a sume-a cetegureees vheech shuoold huld zee pusteengs mede-a frum Blugs. Vheele-a nut necessery, it is edfeesed tu creete-a a poobleeceshun type-a fur blug pusteengs speceefficelly und leenk thees type-a tu zee cetegury-tree-a yuoo creeted fur blug pusteengs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Go into the config section of the BloggerAPI module and configure the publication type to use for blog postings. Select either News articles or your publication type which you created.
entry.translation: Gu intu zee cunffeeg secshun ooff zee BluggerEPI mudoole-a und cunffeegoore-a zee poobleeceshun type-a tu use-a fur blug pusteengs. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Select ieezeer Noos erteecles oor yuoor poobleeceshun type-a vheech yuoo creeted.

entry.string: Basically you're all set now to start blogging. Use your favorite tool for managing your blog postings. For windows we recommend
entry.translation: Beseecelly yuoo're-a ell set noo tu stert bluggeeng. Use-a yuoor fefureete-a tuul fur munegeeng yuoor blug pusteengs. Fur veendoos ve-a recummend

entry.string: and for other operating systems
entry.translation: und fur oozeer oopereteeng systems

entry.string: These two are the ones we test the API with and make sure that it at least works with those.
entry.translation: Zeese-a tvu ere-a zee oones ve-a test zee EPI veet und meke-a soore-a thet it et leest vurks veet thuse-a.

entry.string: Point your blogging client to the url: http://www.yourxaraya.com/ws.php?type=xmlrpc and use your Xaraya account for authentication. The rest should be self-explanatory.
entry.translation: Pueent yuoor bluggeeng cleeent tu zee url: http://www.yourxaraya.com/ws.php?type=xmlrpc und use-a yuoor Xereya eccuoont fur oozeenteeceshun. Zee rest shuoold be-a selff-ixplunetury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Included Blocks
entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: There are no included blocks.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks.

entry.string: Included Hooks
entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks

entry.string: There are no included hooks.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
